cnbc.title: Tether reportedly seeks lofty $500 billion valuation in capital raise
cnbc.summary: The crypto company is looking to raise between $15 billion and $20 billion in exchange for a roughly 3% stake through a private placement, the report said.

cnbc.summary: Disney announced price hikes of roughly $2 to $3 for its subscription packages on Tuesday.

cnbc.title: Nexstar-owned ABC affiliates won't show Kimmel's return Tuesday, joining Sinclair in preempting program
